verses.name: Numbers 22:38
verses.text: And Balaam said unto Balak, Lo, I am come unto thee: have I now any power at all to say any thing? the word that God putteth in my mouth, that shall I speak.

verses.name: Numbers 22:39
verses.text: And Balaam went with Balak, and they came unto Kirjath–huzoth.

verses.name: Numbers 22:40
verses.text: And Balak offered oxen and sheep, and sent to Balaam, and to the princes that were with him.

verses.name: Numbers 22:41
verses.text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that Balak took Balaam, and brought him up into the high places of Baal, that thence he might see the utmost part of the people.
